means: 纯朴的，率真的，头脑简单的

sentence.Network_en: Some simpleminded observers fear that foreign enterprise will dominate government circles.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些头脑简单的评论家担心外国企业会左右政界人士.

sentence.Network_en: For two hours did this singlehearted and simpleminded girl toil through the mazes of the forest.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位心地单纯的傻姑娘在林间曲径中艰难地走了两个来小时.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... simplehearted 纯洁的 simpleminded 纯朴的 simpleness 简单.
星火网络“一点通”单词记忆法 - 外语角 - 时空网 ... bearded 有胡须的 Simpleminded 头脑简单的 Wooded 长有树林的.
老实_百度百科 ... [well-behaved] 规规矩矩的 [simpleminded;naive;easily taken in] 不聪明 [honest] 诚实的.

list.abs: He takes things too seriously.他总把问题想的过于严重 He is simpleminded.他头脑简单 He is on edge today.他头脑简单 He's talkactive.他是个多嘴多舌的.

entry.tran: 头脑简单的;天真的;愚蠢的
entry.def: If you describe someone as simple-minded, you believe that they interpret things in a way that is too simple and do not understand how complicated things are.

example.tran: 西尔维是个天真的爱幻想的人。
他的政治观点也很愚蠢。

auth_sentence.content: The Hot equals Drier statements are just the most simpleminded.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Hot equals Drier statements are just the most simpleminded.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Hot equals Drier statements are just the most simpleminded.

auth_sentence.content: Get off your simpleminded equivalences and go have a sandwich.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Get off your simpleminded equivalences and go have a sandwich.

auth_sentence.content: Its prose aims for tough-minded simplicity but keeps landing on simpleminded sententiousness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its prose aims for tough-minded simplicity but keeps landing on simpleminded sententiousness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its prose aims for tough-minded simplicity but keeps landing on simpleminded sententiousness.
